content.p: To discuss how we can work together, contact Kerry Moorhouse by email. Below are some ways we can collaborate. Our academics can offer world-leading expertise through consultancy arrangements covering: We can offer: The School of Pharmacy has five research divisions housed in state of the art modern facilities. We are interested in applying our expertise and research techniques for the benefit of your business. We host the Interface and Surface Analysis Centre (ISAC), an access point for commercial and industrial clients to surface analytical expertise, facilities and problem solving consultancy at the University and its partner, the National Physical Laboratory (NPL). Our graduates are trained for careers in pharmacy and the wider healthcare industry. Contact us to find out about the opportunities in: For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
